name: RoroKing
description:
Overview

Roro King is an online TPS multiplayer game for PC. Players fight as a team for the title of “Roro King”, the highest honor for teenagers on planet Roro. Players will be divided into two teams in each match and must use different kinds of bombs to defeat opponents in this virtual arena. 

Gameplay

There are four different characters, each with their own  unique item and ability that players can choose from. In this game, players can run, jump, throw bombs and pick up the Roro Ball. Kills count for 1 point while scoring a goal with the Roro ball will award the team with more points. The team with the highest score at the end of 3 rounds wins the match.

Controls

* Internet connection required to play

RoroKing was made by SHVFS GD01 students in a span of 5 months
